projects.name: Dinosaur Island
projects.blurb: In 1987 I wrote the #1 computer game in America: Designasaurus. Now, I want to update the award-winning game in 3D for Windows!

projects.name: 2D Space MMO
projects.blurb: 2D Space MMO is a fast paced, massively multi-player arcade-style shooter set in a player generated universe.

projects.name: Objecty - a tool for all 2D game developers!
projects.blurb: The ultimate tool for all 2D game developers. Create skeletal animations, sprites, levels and more. Use with your existing engines!

projects.name: Operation S
projects.blurb: The military survivor game

projects.name: Industry
projects.blurb: An RTS/FPS computer game where you can not only build your base and army but also take control of your units and fight as one of them.

projects.name: Soul Champs - A New Breed of Monster Catching Game
projects.blurb: Soul Champs is a monster catching game that allows you to find , catch , train , breed and battle with your friends all over the world.

projects.name: Cube Jumper - The Cubening
projects.blurb: Cubejumper is a fast-paced Puzzle-Platformer game featuring more cubes than you could shake a cube at! Also bloins! Lots of bloins!

projects.name: FPS Creator Reloaded
projects.blurb: A tool for creating high quality First Person Shooter Games on your PC. Easy to use with amazing end game results.

projects.name: Circus of Light
projects.blurb: Beautiful hand-drawn video game about a unique circus that only takes place when lightning strikes. Join Åska in her quest to save it.

projects.name: Kung Fu Superstar: Become the Ultimate Martial Arts Stuntman
projects.blurb: Become the most popular Martial Arts stuntman Hollywood has ever known, while learning real Kung Fu techniques and fighting in movies!

projects.name: World Championship Boxing Manager Web Browser Game
projects.blurb: Coming soon! The most realistic online browser based boxing management game with great gameplay.

projects.name: The Ship: Full Steam Ahead
projects.blurb: The Ship: Full Steam Ahead will be a steampunk sequel to the popular 1920's-themed computer game, The Ship.

projects.name: Dog Pile Maze Game
projects.blurb: Hours of fun await you. This game will make you race against the clock! Navigate the maze and take your dog outside before he…Uh oh.

projects.name: Lethal Paintballers
projects.blurb: You can literally be in this new light gun type shooter by submitting video to the project!

projects.name: StarJacked : The Adventure Begins Kickstarter Reboot
projects.blurb: A space adventure of galactic proportions. What you do is up to you but only if you survive.

projects.name: BLOOD GUTS & GLORY
projects.blurb: A modern FPS set in photorealistic London locations such as Leicester Sq., Tower of London, Piccadilly Circus, London Eye, Westminster

projects.name: The Ancients
projects.blurb: The Ancients is a 2D Sandbox Simulation multiplayer RPG, a generated world that lives with or without you and your friends interaction.

projects.name: Urban War Defence
projects.blurb: Help BudgieGames get this game and Lander : Mission Control funded so they can get noticed and released on multiple platforms!

projects.name: LunarX
projects.blurb: Worried about the end of the world? Get out while you can! Can’t afford a spaceship? Pretend you can while you play LunarX.

projects.name: Spacecore
projects.blurb: Spacecore; be the centre of their universe.  Fight for justice or operate in the grey.  Just remember the buck stops with you!
